amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the account for operation, maintenance, improvement, and repair of Agriculture buildings and facilities by $20,900,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the account for operation, maintenance, improvement, and repair of Agriculture buildings and facilities by $20,900,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 304 (Roll no. 423).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 304 (Roll no. 423).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
